description:
M16 Eagle nebula, legendary Pillars of Creation. Oh hell yeah. This one was unplanned and very very pleasent as a result of few factors. For starters- I still don't have astrodark back, so I imaged during civil and nautical dark. Another thing- this target goes up to whopping 21 degrees altitude! I imaged it betweed 16 and 21 degrees, so details are nowhere near what could be possible to get if it were at proper altitude. In any case, I really really enjoyed imaging and processing it, I still plan to get SII data (I currently have 3x300), hopefully weather will cooperate :) My star masks got better since my last image, but nowhere near perfect and I still struggle with them, but hopefully I can find a way to get those pesky little stars that tend to avoid me.

Dates: 2017-07-18, 2017-07-19, 2017-07-20, 2017-07-22

Processing details:
1. Ha Deconvolution- https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=52
2. Ha NR using MMT https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=173
3. Ha Histogram transformation https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=221
4. Ha HDRMT https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=235
5. Ha LHE https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=264
6. Ha Morphological transformation https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=285
7. OIII NR using MMT https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=327
8. OIII Histogram transformation https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=365
9. OIII HDRMT https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=374
10. OIII LHE https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=386
11. OIII Creating starless version https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=400
12. Combination to bicolor https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=526
13. LRGBCombination https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=619
14. Curves Transformation https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=637
15. ACDNR https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=686
16. More Curves https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=707
17. Sharpness with MLT https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=739
18. Color Saturation https://youtu.be/gneDnQVEj6U?t=783
title: M16 Eagle Nebula
